titleStmt.title: Elegies on the much lamented death of the honourable and worthy patriot, Francis Pierepont, Esq., third son of the Right Honourable Robert, Earl of Kingston, who dyed at Nottingham the 30th day of January, 1657/8
titleStmt.author: Pottlintun, O.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
